verses.verse: ( The LORD Is on My Side) הוֹד֣וּ <WH3034> hō·w·ḏū Give thanks לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah·weh to the LORD, כִּי־ <WH3588> kî- for ט֑וֹב <WH2896> ṭō·wḇ He is good; כִּ֖י <WH3588> kî ... לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> lə·‘ō·w·lām endures forever. חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> ḥas·dōw His loving devotion

יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah·weh The LORD [is] לִ֭י Prep│1cs ( lî) on my side; לֹ֣א 3808 Adv-NegPrt ( lō) I will not אִירָ֑א 3372 V-Qal-Imperf-1cs ( ’î·rā) be afraid. מַה־ 4100 Interrog ( mah-) What יַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה 6213 V-Qal-Imperf-3ms ( ya·‘ă·śeh) do לִ֣י Prep│1cs ( lî) to me? אָדָֽם׃ 120 N-ms ( ’ā·ḏām) can man
